greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n/A100762(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: {1}~Join~Table[Function[{q, P}, n/Times @@ Power @@@ Select[q, First@ # <= P &]] @@ {#, Prime@ PrimePi[1 + Max@ #[[All, -1]] ]} &@ FactorInteger[n], {n, 2, 82}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 13 2018 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2008
